creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
description: wood box covered with shellacked newspaper; glass front; horizontal drawer front along bottom; inside box green wood parrot on wood perch; 2 vertical mirrors on PR side; 1 vertical mirror on PL side; metal bar across top with metal ring hanging from it; plastic, perforated ball on bottom on glass; remnant of wire cage, painted white, just inside glass on PL side; inside of box painted white, areas with no pigment; map of Siena on PL lower panel; 3 stamps adhered to back panel mailing label from a hat shop in Florence; blue postage stamp with butterfly from Mo√ßambique; stamp with illustration of Arabian(?) soldier; bottom drawer lined with maps; postcard and cut-out Victorian woman's shoe in drawer
medium: wood, paper, mirror, stamps, metal, plastic, pigment, glass, nails, screws
title: Parrot Box
